name: Hobin Rood and the Chaos Arcade
name_original: Hobin Rood and the Chaos Arcade
description:
Small platformer for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2
Choose between a funny but chaotic mess or a more peaceful mode, if the effects are too much for you. ;)

Controls:

[W, A, S, D] or left analog stick to move

[Space,RMB,l] or a button on controller to jump

[LMB,K] or x to attack

[Q] or LT to tilt

[tab] or START to open settings
